targets.expr: system_paging_usage{host_name=~"$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace="vs_id_0", state="used"}/ ignoring (state) system_paging_limit{host_name=~"$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace="vs_id_0"} * 100

system_filesystem_usage{host_name=~"$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", mountpoint="/", service_namespace="vs_id_0", state="used"}/ ignoring (state) system_filesystem_limit{host_name=~"$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", mountpoint="/", service_namespace="vs_id_0"} * 100

system_filesystem_usage{host_name=~"$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", mountpoint="/var/log", service_namespace="vs_id_0", state="used"}/ ignoring (state) system_filesystem_limit{host_name=~"$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", mountpoint="/var/log", service_namespace="vs_id_0"} * 100

system_memory_usage{host_name=~"$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace="vs_id_0", state="used"}/ ignoring (state) system_memory_limit{host_name=~"$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace="vs_id_0"} * 100
